content.detailedDescription: I had just turned my alarm clock to snooze at 5 in the morning and was going to fall back asleep. before i could shut my eyes i noticed what looked like a plane because of the flashing colors. the more i concentrated on it the less i thought it was a plane. it came forwards towards me a steady speed but then just as quickly went back at the same steady speed. it changed colors multiple times(blue, white, orangish, red twinkle). it then proceeded to move side to side. at first i thought it was just a weird star event but when it moved towards my house in bed i became startled. i woke my girlfriend up to look at it as well so i could confirm i wasn't crazy. i would have watched longer but i had to get ready for work. i lost sight of the object when i went downstairs to get ready. i tried to take a video with my girlfriends phone but i captured nothing.
content.summary: Star-like orb that changed directions and moved closer and further from me, changed colours.

content.detailedDescription:
Sometime in late october in oxnard, ca. (channel islands) between 8 and 9 p.M. i went out to take a walk along the harbor that ran parallel to harbor blvd. in a northern direction. it was a very quiet night and no one else was around. i believe but not sure that it was a friday. i glanced towards the west (toward the open ocean) where a line of homes were. at that exact time i noticed a light above a home (but i knew it was further out over water) rising straight up...Slowly. as it rose, it was getting brighter and bigger (almost the size of a quarter at arms length at the largest). as it rose, (no sounds could be heard due to distance i believe) i notice the bottom part of the object looked like a welders flame, triangular (wide at the top and pointed at the bottom). then, it stopped ascending, the ball of light collapsed and became a small starlike point of light and began to fly in a straight line towards the south (l.A.) as if it were a plane. it actually behaved like a typical plane en route into l.A.X. with blinking aviation lights. i kept track of it until i couldn't see it anymore. by the time i realized i should take a picture or video, it was already a small light going south and nothing came out in the picture but darkness. this whole incident lasted no more than 5 minutes between the time i noticed it acsending and losing it flying towards l.A.
interesting sighting to say the least.
thank you,
art
content.summary: Light rising, glowing brighter and bigger behind houses over ocean then flying south toward l.A.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from morrisdale to philipsburg pa in june of 2013 at about 7 pm. it was dark outside very cloudy right after it had rained and as i looked to my left i could see an orange light in the sky coming from my left about a mile away coming toward me. as it got closer i saw there were two of them. i stopped my vehicle in the middle of the road and watched the two orange pulsating objects fly in front of me from my left to right in a straight line a little above treetop high and about 30 to 50 feet away and i would guess about 30 to 40 miles an hour (too slow for aircraft) they both glowed a pail orange and it looked like black veins pulsating inside of them, weird.... i watched them for appr. 2-5 mins. as they flew out of my sight and a car was coming so i had to get moving on the road. there were no other witnesses that i know of.
content.summary: I was driving form morrisdaleto philipsburg, pa on route 53 south and it was dark around 7 pm looking like it was going to rain with low dark clounds in the sky, i looked to my left and could see a orange light coming from my left in the sky .

content.detailedDescription: Saw passing by the airport while driving at about 9:10 cst, and observed a small glowing ball moving at about 20 mph ddown the runway.
content.summary: Saw while driving at about 9:10 cst

content.detailedDescription:
Took our lab out just before 11:00 pm est, 09/13/13.  standing on the back porch, i noticed (2) glowing objects red-orange in color, moving ne to sw with one in front of the other.  the front object which also seemed to be the most southerly appeared to stop and allow the trailing object to catch up and pass over a period of not more than 15 - 20 seconds.  once the object passed, both proceeded in a sw direction.  within another minute while they were not yet quite overhead, they both suddenly disappeared.  a few moments later, a third light with the same coloring of lesser intensity appeared for a few seconds moving in the same direction and then also disappeared.

our lab who seldom barks other than howling when he hears a siren, howled during the incident and stopped when they disappeared.

we are located nearly due east of gerald r ford airport in grand rapids, mi.  the objects appeared to be roughly 15 degrees north of the airport.
content.summary: Red-orange glow

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready to enter my car and happened to glance up in the eastern sky where i noticed orions belt when i hoticed what at first i thought was a satellite flashing different colors randomly as i was watching it the object made a quick jump straight up then across and back to its original position..I thought my eyes where playing tricks on me so i stared at another star and it did not move so after that i located the craft again and watched it move in several directions but always returned to its original position. as i was driving to work i would occasionally glance over and could still see it. once i got to work i could no longer see it due to parking lot lights.
content.summary: At the 9 oclock posistion from the middle of orions belt quick random movements

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work 4:20am the same way i've gone for 10 yrs. i noticed an airplane type flashing lite in the sky, and thought it was a plane. but i dont remember planes having red,blue,green, and white lites. it seemed to sway side to side like a horse shoe, but i cant confirm it wasn't me doing it.When i got a chance i took 3 videos of it with my galaxy4 phone. of course the video did not do it justice.
content.summary: Center between big dipper and horizon

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on my front porch, waiting for 1/2 time to be finished during steelers game, i saw, in the eastern sky a bright orange, star like light.  this, two nights after seeing 4 of the same, a little further south.  
i watched this light for about 3 minutes.  i stepped back into the house to see if the game was back on.  i turned back to look out the front door, and it was gone.  
a minute later, an airplane was flying from east to west, appeared to be much higher altitude than the orange, stationary light i observed.  
i can't help but feel like this sighting was/is related to the one around the same time of the evening two nights earlier
content.summary: Observed a bright orange, star like light.  hovered in the eastern sky, then vanished

content.detailedDescription: Estaba llevando a unos chilenos amigos a conocer la ciudad desde lo alto de una capilla de la ciudad de popay������n, y observando la ciudad, a lo lejos me d������ cuenta de estas cuatro luces a trav������s de la filmadora. me llam������ la atenci������n pues las luces esaban por encima de las luces normales de la ciudad como se puede observar en el video, adem������s, eran luces que ya hab������a visto en otros videos sobre el tema en alg������n pa������s de europa, paises del norte. el objeto tenia cuatro luces que parpadeaban, luces rojas y amarillas. el objeto estaba estatico en un punto del horizonte. no me sorprendi������ pues de alguna manera estoy familiarizado con estos eventos. el objeto continu������ all������ hasta que dej������ de grabar, dado que debia continuar mostrando la ciudad a estas personas amigas.
content.summary: Objeto en el horizonte en espacio nocturno y estacionado sobre la ciudad

content.detailedDescription: It is in the sky now. looks like a star but changes colors.
content.summary: It is now 11:45p.M. and i have watched it in the sky for at least an hour. it seems to be moving but extremely slowly.

content.detailedDescription: Pyrotechnic fires are recorded and then an object appears in the sky and then i saw in the video check the video at the 2:38 minute.
content.summary: An event observed in the night, an unidentified object

content.detailedDescription:
It was just about 20:00h.  i remembered i had to bring in the us flag and turn on the porch lights.  i stepped outside, and i just took the flag down and started to roll it up on the pole, when i looked up to see which constellations were out. 

that���s when i saw a very bright white (soft white like a light bulb, but very bright) light just sw of the big dippers tail at about 35 to 45 degrees elevation from my position (38��� 32' 58.7" n, 123��� 10' 6.63" w).  i noticed it at about 20:03h.  the burst of light was traveling away from me in the direction of two of the outermost stars of the big dippers tail.

in about 3 to 4 seconds the light started to dim and shrink in size as the got farther away.  then the color of the light shifted reddish as it faded.  if i remember my physics correctly, that may be because it was traveling away from me.  eventually it just faded to where i could no longer see it with my naked eyes.

i hope this report helps.
content.summary: Bright light started to dim shift to red and then fade.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i moved to north beach in corpus christi around four weeks ago.   i am retired and am outside 70% or more of a 24 hour day.  we live right on the water front, and i must say, this place has some seriously odd things going on/around.  first sighting witnesses in the air around the 4th. or 5th. of this month blew my mind, but this one is disturbing. 

a very bright green orb came out of the water on to the sand, then flattened itself. (i'm insane, right?)  yes, it flattened. this highly odd sight then ventured at speeds i can hardly explain, raced down the shoreline, around the sand, over a public beach restroom, back to it original spot, then disappeared back in the water.  did it again after about 3 minutes.  never witnessed it again after that, and i stayed on my waterfront patio quite some time after that, looking, as you can imagine.  two sightings in two weeks.  the aerial was an unknown shape; quite distant, although noticeable purple, red, green, yellow, let's just say "rainbow" lights running around the shape of it.  my husband actually witnessed that one.  i know i am not going mad.  i'm beginning to feel this is a highly active area here by the bay.  i just wish someone could explain the 'water orb" to me. i know what i witnessed.  i just cannot wrap my head around it.  and my feelings on this?   wish someone else could have witnessed this.  highly anxious to see it again.
content.summary: Green blurred orb comming out of bay onto sand/ erratic movement

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my living room i noticed a bright object outside my window around 9 pm.  it was a large bright orange glowing orb moving slowly in an ascending arc high in the sky.  i was thinking about the size and color being unusual as another one appeared... like it had been shot out of something because it appeared out of nowhere where i first noticed the first one.  in the sky from my viewpoint it was larger than an aspirin but smaller than a dime... so much larger than a star or plane lights...And constant glow, not blinking . the bright orange color was very unusual.  then a third one appeared but it seemed more reddish orange.   they followed the same path and disappeared out of my view.  they were moving slowly but the sighting was less than 2 minutes.  i didn't hear any noise and i was thinking if it could be some sort of fireworks but my dog always barks at them and she didn't notice.
content.summary: Out window around 9 pm i saw 3 large orange glowing orbs slowly  ascending arc, one at a time like being shot out

content.detailedDescription: I was at los altos park at bout 6:50 pm i was drinking just finished a beer i went to the grass and laid down there was  couple near by guy and girl  while i waas laying down on the grass as i was looking up in  notice  a silver metallic object straight up there was a cloud the shape of the letter j rite at the top of the letter j is were the object was i told the couple next to do they see what im looking at the metallic object they said yes so i calld channel 4 news kkob news nbc and told the guy that answrd it was about 7:05 they said they were going to go look at it dont know if they did but at bout fiffteen min later the object just went straight up and disapered me and the couple seen it i dont know who the couple was it was a cool expoerience that isnt the first time that me or me and my wife had experienced ufos in this area i was excitedevery time that we see stranged lights in the sky  this isnt the first time that i have seen lights or objects in the sky this is the first time though that  i have writtn to mufon i didnt know how to get a hold of mufon thanks that s my story  frank it was circular and metallic size and shape
content.summary: Metallic and circular star like

content.detailedDescription: I was with a friend in the back of my house. i was in a hammock laying back watching the sky, talking around 6 o' clock. my friend was in a chair then, as i was watching ramdomnly up into the sky i saw a white thing going really fast leaving a bright white long tail behind going from the back part of the house to the front side of the house.My friend was able to see it too. these unidentified flying thing was significantly closer than what airplanes usually do and considering the distance, you see airplanes going kind of slowly from one side to another while they are going fast enough to travel but this thing went really fast from one place to another. afterwards we just saw a white thing farther than the first one in front of the house and couldnt tell if it is related to the first thing we saw or not starlike
content.summary: watching ramdomnly up into the sky i saw a white thing going really fast leaving a bright white long tail behind

content.detailedDescription:
We were bring groceries in from the car while the disc's crossed the night sky in a northern direction, i ran in and grabbed my camera, photographed the discs giving of a type sparks from each that does not show on the video however when a plane entered the area i could still the discs but i was unable to capture them again once the plane was in the area. they were very bright and extremely noticeable. they hovered and than went in a northerly direction again. there several and more came from the east and joined them they eventually diapered. the event lasted a good 8 minutes and was seen by 3 of use.
i was trying to get them to notice us, at which time they did hover for a period of time. the movement was smooth, rather slow. i was trying to contact them with thought. sounds unbelievable but true. i was calm and filled with wonder. i was having difficulty holding the camera still as i took the video, i was filmed free hand, no tri pod or brace of any kind the movement of the disc in the video look shaky but the movement of the discs was very smooth.
content.summary: Disc's traveled north east giving of spark the video does not show. disc's pulsated, several were in area. when plane came could not pick picture up any longer

content.detailedDescription: I have reported  this once before to mufon. every night these objects are visible. they appear to be flashing different colors. they move up and down and i have counted as many as seven. i live close to austin bergstrom int.National airport and see many aircraft. these are not aircraft.I think satellites move across the sky.These objects maintain their position.Some are as  bright as the brightest star and some are less bright,like a dimmer star. i am not aware of any satellites that stay in one position so these may well be some type of satellite. maybe a type of military craft? i have contacted a local news station and have yet to hear from them.Other folks have seen them when i point them out,and agree that the objects are flashing and moving. my goal is to find out what they are.I would appreciate any information you can provide.It is obvious that anyone in the austin/bastrop area can see them,yet no one can tell me what they are. will you enlighten me please?
content.summary: Starlike,pulsating,like a lighthouse in the sky,moved up and down,various colors

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the beach about 9:30 at night when myself and a friend noticed 2 sets of red lights over the beach approx 300-400 ft away and 50+/-ft above the water. they appeared to be leaving a marsh area behind the beach. 

they appeared red with a orange/white center that sort of glowed in fiery kind of way when they were close, and appeared completely red as they got further away. my initial thought was they looked like mini suns. they were steady in intensity and did not flicker or change color. the video shows them as being white at times but to the naked eye they were always red. 

aprox 2 minutes later a second set of lights appeared from the same location and followed the same trajectory out over the water. 

neither sets of lights made any sound, moved slowly and smoothly over the water. i dont know how big they really were but at my distance of 300-400 feet away they initially appeared to be about the size of a softball.

there were six other witness to the sighting including a couple on the porch of the beach house behind us and 4 teenagers a little ways down the beach.

the video was taken with my samsung galaxy iii
content.summary: 2 seperate pairs of objects flew from the beach over the bay slowly and very low with no sound

content.detailedDescription: When arriving on the property home from work i drove down the drive way, and when approaching the opening to see the house i observed an entity that was approximately eight in a half foot tall to ten foot tall.  it came from the direction of the house from the edge of the grass.  i would have never noticed it if it wouldn't have been reflective of the sun light that evening.  it then proceeded to cross the drive way in what looked like three steps, which the drive would usually take a normal man to cross in about 15 to 20 large steps.  i noticed it was a chrome color very reflective i could see it had arms an d legs but could not see the hands or feet almost like they were cupped.  i also observed it had a pointed-elongated head almost egyptian like.  it then disappeared into the wooded pasture.  now while heading to and from work or while driving out in the pasture i feel watched, and i catch glimpses of it on the drive, and dirt road beside the property.
content.summary: Saw a chrome-colored entity walking across the road

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were leaving the grocery store when i noticed a starlike object to the west looking above and beyond the grocery store. object was very high in the sky, appeared to be above and among the clouds. object appeared to either be descending slowly or moving away from us in a fairly straight line. object was seen in sky for only 2 mins (roughly) before either fading out of sight because of distance or dropping behind the building/tree line.
content.summary: Shiny star-like object above and among the clouds, descended below tree line or moved out of seeing distance

content.detailedDescription: T was the darkest point of the night.  the stars were so bright because there were no clouds.  saw what looked like a cloud reflecting light but it was actually a black triangle that made no noise. lights on the bottom randomly flashed
content.summary: It was the darkest point of the night.  the stars were so bright because there were no clouds.  saw what looked like a cloud reflecting light but it was actually a black triangle that made no noise. lights on the bottom randomly flashed

content.detailedDescription: I was getting out of my truck to hunt on a clear sky early morning. i saw two white objects flying across the sky at a decent pace. i thought they might have been planes until i realized they didn't have blinking lights. after a couple minutes two planes were visible in the sky, so i ruled the plane possibility out of the question. i pulled my camera phone out and recorded a video, after ten minutes of watching these lights, they took off. the two objects were not very close together, but were heading in the same direction.
content.summary: Saw two objects flying, thought they were planes until i actually spotted two planes.

content.detailedDescription: Was in monterey sep. 14 and 15 there were lights that changed colors and didn't move for over an hour the second day it stayed in same area for a few hours . we saw somthing similar to this sep.5 over the bay. so we pulled out the phone and got these lights on video
content.summary: 2nights in a row this object just stayed n the same are for over an hour so i was able to get video

content.detailedDescription: Was in monterey sep. 14 and 15 there were lights that changed colors and didn't move for over an hour the second day it stayed in same area for a few hours . we saw somthing similar to this sep.5 over the bay. so we pulled out the phone and got these lights on video
content.summary: 2nights in a row this object just stayed n the same are for over an hour so i was able to get video

content.detailedDescription:
So i am used to waking up early for work even on days off and i often go to grab a breakfast item from the near by fast food spot.  the first morning as i was pulling into my block i saw two objects..White lights appearing to be a star or satellite or a plane at the time.....So i drove out behind my house into the dark desert as i am located on the very edge of town...Parked and got out to watch these objects.   one stayed on a steady path moving as a satellite or plane would.  "i am sure it was not a plane as there were no flashing lights and i am accustomed to seeing air planes in las vegas" and the second object appeared  to fade away  as if it was rapidly moving up into space.  the first object that was identical  was still moving on the original path  moving southwest to north or northwest toward creech afb of possibly a51.   after thinking that sighing was not an airplane since it had no flashing lights and since the sun was not up i was doubtful on a satellite theory i decided to venture out to see if i saw anything this morning at the same time...  to my surprise there it was again..At the same time. 5:30 am or so... moving over what seems to be the mountain range between pahrump and las vegas.  this object was the same in description..Only one this time and  it stayed on a steady path moving sw to nw i believe.

 i will continue to watch for this daily as i believe it is either a military ufo or the tall whites out at indian springs "creech afb" doing their nightly running around.
  funny  i never see any planes along this flight path..Only these objects.
content.summary: Second day in a week that i saw what looked to be a star in a clear sky moving.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were outside on a bench. 3 flashes appeared with loud hum like a diesel would sound. after i got my ipod to take photo. a bright white object was hovering where the flashes appeared. it stayed for 10 minutes. it would appear and then come on extreemely bright and then go totally out for a few minutes and then appear with a flash or sometimes just very bright. my ipod will not pick up in a far distance. so this was very close. myself and 2 boys have have visitations. myself since i was young. the oklahoma state bureau of ufo investigators came and detected i had missing time(hypnosis on tape) and also detected 4 implants in me. i have yet to have help. marilyn carlson and a military man named ken storch were the ones here to talk to us. they have called off and on but have not helped with the issue of the implants. i have all the side effects of abduction as well as my brother. i have had 2 miscarriages, one rare pregnancy that was called a molar pregnancy. a dnc was done and the doctor said they sent it off to pathology to be tested and never let me know anything else. i have had major nosebleeds and migrains along with "so called" fibromyalgia. i have a place behind my neck that if touched sends a painful electrical shock through my body and it is in my neck on the surface by my spinal cord. my dr. refuses to do a mri saying it is only due to fibromyalgia. my son was born with a "v" red mark on his forhead and has seen entities since he was 3. he is now 14 and will not sleep alone. we still have visitations. most while awake. desperate! please help
content.summary: 3 huge flashes of light (yellow) with a hum like a diesel with each flash. 3 witnesses. recorded 5 minutes with ipod

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed what seemed to be something on fire in the sky which was surrounded by 3 smaller bright amber lights. all lights were solid. the center glow stopped shortly after witnessing and the small amber lights started rotating slowly around a point in the sky. each light followed the same exact path. no sound was audible. could not see any shape. not sure what type of helicopter has no blinking lights and just a solitary amber light.
content.summary: Glowing amber light surrounded by 3 smaller amber lights

Videos speak for themselves..

content.summary: Multipul ufo spheres katy tx sept 14 2013.. a continuation of my past experience with 100's of these objects from 2008.. note: they returned on the anniversary of sept 2008 experience..

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my front porch, approximately, 9:30 - 9:45 pm on saturday (9/14/2013) and i was looking at the night sky (stars).  to my right (south east, i saw 4 bright orange starlike objects.  not moving, just "there" in formation (rectangle).  they were very bright, then after about 15 - 20 seconds, started fading one by one, till they just vanished.  there was no "flight path", they seemed to just be stationary.
they didn't fade like some sort of firework burning out, they just became dim, then were gone.  total time till the last one vanished was approximately 1 minute 45 seconds.
i immeditately when i observed the objects thought to myself "this isn't normal", this isn't something that was shot into the sky or some sort of plane.
i was struck by the fact that they seemed far enough away that they were "starlike", but they were brighter and they were definitely together, as they formed a rectangle.
content.summary: Observed 4 bright orange, star like lights, rectangle formation, vanished one by one
